name: Stefilmon
effect: [When Digivolving] If this Digimon has 1 digivolution card, you may place up to 2 level 4 or lower yellow Digimon cards from your hand at the bottom of this Digimon's digivolution cards in any order. Then, ＜Draw 1＞ for each Digimon card you placed. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] When this card is trashed due to activating this Digimon's ＜Digi-Burst＞, 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
